summary: Adds glow maps to Paarthurnax. This doesn't add or replace textures, just an add-on.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]https://farm9.staticflickr.com/8573/15807151614_ef78cdef3d_b.jpg[/img][img]https://farm8.staticflickr.com/7444/15807150384_98c411de10_b.jpg[/img][/center]

[center][size=3][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][color=#d8d8d8]This mod adds glow maps on Paarthurnax. Nothing more than add-on, you can use any texture replacers[/color][/font][color=#efefef].[/color][/size][/center]
author: ProtologolusX
